sourcesContent:
// src/pages/Reports.jsx import React from "react"; import { generatePDFReport } from "../utils/generatepdf"; const Reports = ({ data }) => { // If no data is passed as props, use fallback placeholders const patientData = data || { name: "John Doe", age: "--", gender: "--", heartRate: "--", spo2: "--", temperature: "--", ecg: "--", bp: "--", aiRisk: "--", aiSuggestion: "--", }; const generatePDF = () => { const reportData = { name: patientData.name, age: patientData.age, gender: patientData.gender, createdAt: new Date().toISOString(), heartRate: patientData.heartRate, spO2: patientData.spo2, pulse: patientData.heartRate, temperature: patientData.temperature, bp: patientData.bp, ecg: patientData.ecg, risk: patientData.aiRisk, tips: patientData.aiSuggestion, }; generatePDFReport(reportData); }; return (

Patient Health Report

Doctor's Report

Name: {patientData.name}

Age: {patientData.age}

Gender: {patientData.gender}

Heart Rate: {patientData.heartRate} bpm

SpO₂: {patientData.spo2} %

Temperature: {patientData.temperature} °C

ECG: {patientData.ecg} mV

Blood Pressure: {patientData.bp} mmHg

AI Risk: {patientData.aiRisk}

AI Suggestion: {patientData.aiSuggestion}

* This is an AI-generated report. Please consult a licensed doctor for clinical diagnosis.

); }; export default Reports;
